Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.strategy.movestrategy

Interface MoveStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApolloMove, ArtemisMove, AthenaMove, BasicMove, MinotaurMove, PrometheusMove
public interface MoveStrategy
Move strategies interface

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String checkMove​(TurnInfo turnInfo, GameBoard gameboard, Player player, int chosenWorker, int[] movingTo)
    Checks if the move is feasible
    java.lang.String move​(TurnInfo turnInfo, GameBoard gameboard, Player player, int chosenWorker, int[] movingTo)
    Performes the move

  • Method Details

    • move

      java.lang.String move​(TurnInfo turnInfo, GameBoard gameboard, Player player, int chosenWorker, int[] movingTo)
      Performes the move
      Parameters:
      turnInfo - object containing information about current turn
      gameboard - object representing the gameboard
      player - player performing the move
      chosenWorker - chosen worker (0 or 1)
      movingTo - array containing destination towercell x,y
      Returns:
      buildRequest message

    • checkMove

      java.lang.String checkMove​(TurnInfo turnInfo, GameBoard gameboard, Player player, int chosenWorker, int[] movingTo)
      Checks if the move is feasible
      Parameters:
      turnInfo - object containing information about current turn
      gameboard - object representing the gameboard
      player - player performing the move
      chosenWorker - chosen worker (0 or 1)
      movingTo - array containing destination towercell x,y
      Returns:
      one of error messages or moveOk message
